abstract.t: The QUIC DATAGRAM extension provides application protocols running over QUIC with a mechanism to send unreliable data while leveraging the security and congestion-control properties of QUIC. However, QUIC DATAGRAM frames do not provide a means to demultiplex application contexts. This document describes how to use QUIC DATAGRAM frames with HTTP/3 by association with HTTP requests. Additionally, this document defines the Capsule Protocol that can convey datagrams over prior versions of HTTP.
